unfinished: Hmm, looks like we haven't implimented this feature yet. Check back later!

restore.label: Restore Reason
restore.helperText: Enter a reason for this restore

rollback.label: Rollback Reason
rollback.helperText: Enter a reason for this rollback

toasts.restoreError: Sorry, there was an error, likely an edit conflict. This edit has not been restored.
toasts.rollbackError: Sorry, there was an error, likely an edit conflict. Your rollback has not been applied.
toasts.newerRev: A newer revision was detected. Your rollback has not been applied.
toasts.userUndefined: Sorry, the target user does not exist, cannot be found, or is hidden from the public. Your action has not been completed.
toasts.watching: Alerts Enabled - please keep this tab open.

rollbackAvailableDialog.content:
You have rollback permissions!
Would you like to use the faster rollback API in future or continue using a rollback-like setting?
You can change this in your preferences at any time.

tamperProtection.warningContent: You are currently using RedWarn in a way that is strongly discouraged under guidelines set at WP:REDWARN/A.

user.load_wait: Please be patient while the user information is being loaded.
user.levelInfo_none: User has not received any warnings this month
user.levelInfo_notice: User has received a level 1 notice this month
user.levelInfo_caution: User has received a level 2 notice this month
user.levelInfo_warning: User has received a level 3 warning this month
user.levelInfo_final: User has received a level 4 final warning this month. $t(ui:warn.user.report)
user.levelInfo_policyviolation: User has received an immediate level 4 final warning this month. $t(ui:warn.user.report)

reason.levelSelectionLevelNotPresent: There is no level {{level}} {{levelReadable}} template available.

templateSearchDialog.pressXtoSelect: Press ENTER to use this template
templateSearchDialog.tip: Tip: Double-click a warning to quickly select it, or press ENTER to select the top result.

validation.validationFailedIconTooltip: There are issues which are preventing you from submitting this warning. Click here for more information.
validation.noWarnTemplate: You don't have a warning template selected. Select one from the dropdown or search tool.
validation.noWarnLevel: You haven't selected a warning level. Please select an appropriate level.
validation.noTargetUser: You have not inputed any target users.
validation.noSelfWarn: Local restrictions mean that you cannot warn yourself. If you want to test, please use a sandbox user.

configErrorDialog.title: Configuration Error
configErrorDialog.content: Your RedWarn configuration could not be loaded correctly and has been reset. If this issue persists, please contact the RedWarn team.

missing.title: Style Missing
missing.content: The style set in your RedWarn configuration cannot be found. It has been set to the default style for now.
